configurations.name: http://import React, { ReactNode } from 'react';import { NavigationContainer, DefaultTheme } from '@react-navigation/native';interface CustomNavigationContainerProps {  children: ReactNode;}const MyTheme = {  ...DefaultTheme,  colors: {    ...DefaultTheme.colors,    background: '#ffffff', // Change the background color  },};const CustomNavigationContainer: React.FC<CustomNavigationContainerProps> = ({ children }) => (  <NavigationContainer theme={MyTheme}>    {children}  </NavigationContainer>);export default CustomNavigationContainer;
configurations.url: http://import React, { ReactNode } from 'react';import { NavigationContainer, DefaultTheme } from '@react-navigation/native';interface CustomNavigationContainerProps {  children: ReactNode;}const MyTheme = {  ...DefaultTheme,  colors: {    ...DefaultTheme.colors,    background: '#ffffff', // Change the background color  },};const CustomNavigationContainer: React.FC<CustomNavigationContainerProps> = ({ children }) => (  <NavigationContainer theme={MyTheme}>    {children}  </NavigationContainer>);export default CustomNavigationContainer;
